چنگھوا یونیورسٹی کے گیت کا نام کیا ہے؟ Tsinghua University anthem name
University Anthem: With lyrics (“The Green West Mountain”) written by Professor Wang Luan-Xiang in 1923, the University anthem was composed by Zhang Li-Zhen and edited by Zhao Yuan-Ren.
